SELECT i.id AS itemId,i.item_name AS itemName, i.sell_counts AS sellCounts, ii.url AS imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount AS price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id AND ii.is_main = 1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT item_id,MIN(price_discount) AS price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id) tempSpec ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND i.item_name like '%${map.keywords}%'
order by
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount desc
i.item_name asc
